oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Poets and Prophets program - Al Anderson - 2016-02-06
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Interview with songwriter, singer and musician Al Anderson from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on February 6, 2016
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Al Anderson;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Interview conducted by Michael Gray. Includes audio from video and selected recorded excerpts. Performances include; Right On Time (with Sharon Vaughn) -- Ridin' In My Car -- Some Things Never Get Old (with Vince Gill) -- Unbelievable (with Jeffrey Steele).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Anderson, Al (Vocalist); Gill, Vince; Steele, Jeffrey (Musician); Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
